rukus.text: 27|67|Fushinjin no mono wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ya watashi-tachi sosen ga, doro ni natte shimatte kara, hontōni yomigaera sa reru nodearou ka.
27|68|Watashi-tachi mo watashi-tachi no sosen mo, izen, kono koto o yakusoku sa reta.Daga hontōni kore wa, mukashi no hito no monogatari nisuginai.'
27|69|Itte yaru ga ī. `Chijō o tabi shite, korera tsumibukaimono no saigo ga dōdeatta ka o mitodokeyo.'
27|70|Anata wa, kare-ra ni tsuite hitan shinakute mo yoi. Mata kare-ra no sakubō ni kokoro o itamenakute mo yoi.
27|71|Kare-ra wa iu nodearu. `Anata gataga shinjitsu o iu nonara, kono (ikaku no) yakusoku (ga kuru no) wa itsudesuka.'
27|72|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata no isoide iru koto no ikutsu ka wa, anata gata ni sematte iru kamo shirenai.'
27|73|Hontōni anata no omo wa, ningen ni taishi onkei o hodokosu okatadearu. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa kansha mo shite inai.
27|74|Hontōni anata no omo wa, kare-ra ga mune ni kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte ora reru.
27|75|Ten to ji no kakusa reta koto wa, hitoshiku meiryō ni shosatsu no naka ni (shirusa rete) aru.
27|76|Hontōni kono kuruān wa, Isuraeru no shison ni, kare-ra ga giron shite iru mo ōkina mondai ni tsuite kataru monodearu.
27|77|Hontōni sore wa, shinkō suru mono-tachi ni taisuru michibikideari jihidearu.
27|78|Hontōni anata no omo wa, o jibun no eichi o motte kare-ra no ma o saitei sa rerudearou. Kare wa, iryoku narabinaku zenchi de ara reru.
27|79|Sokode anata wa (subete) arrā ni o makase shi nasai. Hontōni anata wa, meihakuna shinri no (michi no)-jō ni iru nodearu.
27|80|Hontōni anata wa, shisha ni kika seru koto wa dekinai. Mata kikoenu mono ni yobikakete mo kika seru koto wa dekinai. (Kotoni) kare-ra ga se o mukete hikitoru toki wa.
27|81|Mata anata wa mienai mono o, mayoi kara michibiku koto wa dekinai. Anata wa tada, waga shirushi o shinjiru-sha-tachi ni kika se rareru dakedearu. Sō sureba kare-ra wa fukujū, kie surudearou.
27|82|Kare-ra ni taishi o kotoba ga jitsugen sa reru toki, ware wa daichi kara ichi kemono o gen washi, ningen-tachi ga waga shirushi o shinjinakatta koto o tsuge saseyou.
